mapper.insert: insert into `tbl_contacts` (id, owner, source, appellation, fullName, email, job, mphone, description, address, birth, customerId, createBy, createTime, contactSummary, nextContactTime) value (#{id}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{appellation}, #{fullName}, #{email}, #{job}, #{mphone}, #{description}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{customerId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime})
